response_transaction.temDISABLED: Occurs if the DeletableAccounts amendment is not enabled.
response_transaction.temDST_IS_SRC: Occurs if the Destination matches the sender of the transaction (Account field).
response_transaction.tecDST_TAG_NEEDED: Occurs if the Destination account requires a destination tag, but the DestinationTag field was not provided.
response_transaction.tecNO_DST: Occurs if the Destination account is not a funded account in the ledger.
response_transaction.tecNO_PERMISSION: Occurs if the Destination account requires deposit authorization and the sender is not preauthorized.
response_transaction.tecTOO_SOON: Occurs if the sender's Sequence number is too high. The transaction's Sequence number plus 256 must be less than the current Ledger Index.
response_transaction.tecHAS_OBLIGATIONS: Occurs if the account to be deleted is connected to objects that cannot be deleted in the ledger. (This includes objects created by other accounts, such as escrows.)
response_transaction.tefTOO_BIG: Occurs if the sending account is linked to more than 1000 objects in the ledger. The transaction could succeed on retry if some of those objects were deleted separately first.

request_data_response_ws.invalidParams: One or more fields are specified incorrectly, or one or more required fields are missing.
request_data_response_ws.lgrNotFound: The ledger specified by the ledger_hash or ledger_index does not exist, or it does exist but the server does not have it.
request_data_response_ws.actNotFound: The Address specified in the account field of the request does not correspond to an account in the ledger.

headers.no_offers: No Available Offers, reduce quantity or change currency
headers.no_input: Set a value and currency above
headers.max_trustlines: Exceeded max of 88 trustlines or more

error.get_ott_data: Failed to fetch your XUMM data
error.subscribe_to_account: Failed to subscribe to the XRP Ledger
error.version: Please update XUMM to use this xApp
error.sign_offer_create: A wild error occured creating an Offer
error.signin: A wild error occured trying to login
error.sign_cancel_offer: A wild error occured trying to cancel an Offer
error.get_offer_data: A wild error occured trying to get your Offer data
error.get_curated_assets: Currency list is not available from the API
error.react_native_webview: There is an error with the webview
error.path_find: An error occured finding a path
error.max_trustlines: This account has 88 or more trustlines, please use a different account to use Path Finding.

info.no_funds: You do not have funds for this currency
